mapper.insert: insert into taskitem (id, content, judgefinish, name,publisher,title) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{judgefinish,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{publisher,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.delete: delete from taskitem where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select count(id) from taskitem where name=#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and publisher = #{publisher,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
